values: 反馈；回馈；反馈的意见；反馈信息；评价；意见；（电器的）反馈噪音；反馈噪声；回授（电子学中的一种现象）；响应

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 回原处;  后面的;  向后地;  背部, 后面

word_group.brief_definition: 反馈环路；反馈回路；反馈环
反馈信号；信号反馈；回馈信号
消费者反馈；消费者的反馈；顾客回馈

bilingual.source: We sincerely hope to receive your feedback.
bilingual.target: 我们真诚地希望收到您的反馈。

bilingual.source: Give them feedback about their choice of language.
bilingual.target: 给他们关于语言选择的反馈。

bilingual.source: Present the poem to the class and ask for feedback.
bilingual.target: 向全班展示诗歌并征求反馈。

bilingual.source: Give them feedback about their presentation of the poem.
bilingual.target: 给他们关于诗歌展示的反馈。

bilingual.source: Many teachers try to give positive and negative feedback at the same time.
bilingual.target: 许多老师试图同时给出正面和负面的反馈。
我们需要征求更多的反馈。
我们需要接收更多的反馈。

bilingual.source: The manager was frank in his feedback.
bilingual.target: 经理在反馈中非常坦率。
定期反馈有助于提高绩效。

list.abstract: feedback（英 [ˈfiːdbæk]，美 [ˈfiːdbæk]），英语单词，名词，意思为反馈的信息；反馈；反馈噪音。短语搭配有positive feedback（正反馈）。例句为“Feedback should also look toward the future.（反馈也应该着眼于未来。）” feedback相关近义词有production、outcome等。
《feedback》是2016年Kanye West演唱的一首歌曲，收录在Kanye West发行的专辑《The Life of Pablo》中。

yingyinNormal.en: No, I respect your feedback. Thank you for being so professional about everything.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我尊重你的反馈，感谢你能表现得如此专业。

yingyinNormal.en: I've been doing it for six months or so, but I've gotten some great feedback, and I have a ton of referrals if you want.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我干了六个月左右了，得到了一些满意的反馈，如果你要的话我有大量的推荐。

yingyinNormal.en: Asking for feedback is a really important habit to get into as you leave the structure of the school calendar and exams and grades behind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 养成寻求反馈的习惯是非常重要的。特别是在离开学校系统 没了考试和分数之后。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: We get angry, even though it would be more logical for us to be open to feedback from others. This leads to our making inferior decisions, learning less, and falling short of our potentials.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们可能会发怒，即便更理智的做法是保持开放他人的反馈。这导致我们做出差劲的决定，学习更少，不能实现自己的潜力。

yingyinNormal.en: One of the biggest pieces of feedback I've had since my speech is that men and women want to help, but they aren't sure how best to do it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在演讲之后，听到得最多的回应之一是人们想要做出贡献，却不知怎样做才是最好的。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《艾玛·沃特森达沃斯世界经济论坛HeForShe演讲》

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 向后地；往回地；倒回原处地；反向地；回溯；每况愈下地
n. 反馈的信息；反馈；反馈噪音；回授
adj. 向后的；智力迟钝的；羞怯的；犹豫的；线后的；落后的；倒退的

word_family.mean: n. 背；背部；背面；反面；后面；卫；剑桥大学后园；背后；椅背；船体

sense_info_list.en: advice, criticism, or information about how good or useful something or one's work is

examination_example.sentence: Positive <highlight>feedback</highlight> is important for anyone to hear.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 积极的反馈对任何人来说都很重要。

examination_example.sentence: If you're not sure, ask for honest <highlight>feedback</highlight> from trusted friends, colleagues and professionals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你不确定，向你信任的朋友、同事和专业人士寻求诚实的反馈。

examination_example.sentence: The program keeps track of your progress and provides detailed <highlight>feedback</highlight> on your performance and improvement.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个程序会跟踪你的进度，并对你的表现和改进提供详细的反馈。

sense_info_list.en: the unpleasant noise produced by electrical equipment

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 回原处;  后面的;  向后地;  背部, 后面

word_usage.usage:
feedback about/on sth.意为“对……的反馈”，如：
They will be given feedback on their performance.
他们将收到对他们表现的反馈意见。

feedback为不可数名词，如：
The teacher will give you feedback on the test.
老师会对你的测验提供反馈信息。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

sense_info_list.en: advice, criticism, or information about how good or useful something or one's work is

examination_example.sentence: I've had more <highlight>feedback</highlight> in a passive approach.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我用被动的方式得到了更多的反馈。

examination_example.sentence: There'll be more honest <highlight>feedback</highlight> from them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们会提供更为可信的反馈。

examination_example.sentence: To be fair, if Rodriguez had wanted <highlight>feedback</highlight> from some more technophobic (害怕技术的) seniors, he might have ended up in the wrong Brookdale community.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公平地说，如果Rodriguez 希望得到更多恐惧技术的长者的反馈，那么他可能以错误的选择了 Brookdale 社区结束。

examination_example.sentence: What they sometimes lack is <highlight>feedback</highlight> from the people who they hope will use their products.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有时缺乏的是他们希望使用他们的产品的人的反馈。

examination_example.sentence: Companies use customer satisfaction ratings because a shining display of star <highlight>feedback</highlight> has become the nuclear power sources of the modern economy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 企业使用客户满意度评级，是因为星级反馈的高光展示已经成为现代经济的核动力来源。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Feedback</highlight> from the teachable agents further enhances the tutors' learning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “虚拟学生”提供的反馈会进一步加强小老师们自身的学习。

examination_example.sentence: All good <highlight>feedback</highlight> shares something in common.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所有好的反馈都有一些共同点。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Feedback</highlight> should also look toward the future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 反馈也应该着眼于未来。

examination_example.sentence: How many students like the recycling bags according to the <highlight>feedback</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据反馈，有多少学生喜欢回收袋？
